name: Create new Cloze companies from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new company in Cloze. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qZAEEBW9QN4O8XZfrvX0pW0MFips9AKOWNEJ6Kr4oDM/edit?usp=sharing).
